actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with respect to the term of licenses for the operation of radio broadcastings stations.

summary.text: Increases from 3 to 5 years the term for which a license to operate a radio broadcasting station may be issued, and for which such licenses may be renewed under the Communications Act of 1934.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with respect to the term of licenses for the operation of radio broadcastings stations.
